page.title: 11MUMS DAY
page.content: MUM GETS UP EVERY MORNING AT HALF PAST SEVEN ,GOES DOWN STAIRS AND MAKES SOME TEA FOR DAD THEN HE GOES TO WORK.THEN WE HAVE BREAKFAST.MUM WALKS MY BROTHER TO SCHOOL WITH OUR DOG.THEN SHE TAKES OUR DOG FOR A WALK. AFTER THAT SHE DOES SOME HOUSEWORK.IF IT'S A NICE DAY SHE GOES ON A BIKE RIDE UNTIL DINNER TIME.THEN SHE MIGHT DO SOME GARDENING. LATER SHE GOES FOR MY BROTHER. WHEN HE GETS HOME WITH MUM HE USUALLY PLAYS IN THE GARDEN UNTIL MY BROTHER AND I GET HOME.AFTER TEA WE HAVE A SHOWER AND MUM WASHES UP.WE WATCH TV UNTIL NINE O' CLOCK THEN GO TO BED.MUM WATCHES TV TILL TEN O'CLOCK WHEN SHE GOES TO BED AS WELL.
